name: ARoom
description:
"Desperate times call for desperate meanings. You can't learn the truth if you dont step out of the room. Do you have what it takes?"

      ARoom is a horror/thriller game that is developed for "Unexpected Game Jam" by XSStudio. 

Doruk Biçgi = Game+Level Designer/ Artist

Ozan Şenyurt = Developer/ Animator

Berkay Sert = SFX Designer

CONTROLS:

WASD to move, 
E to interact with doors and wardrobes
Press ESC to exit the note.
Press 2 to use glasses.
Press 3 to use the axe.

Have fun :)
